jcr:root.jcr:description: I hate to be the pesky person that tells you to wear your helmet, but I unfortunately know someone who spent a lot of time in the hospital due to a skiing accident. She absolutely could have come out of the whole thing in a lot better shape if she had worn a helmet.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Remember to protect your head!
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

civd-good_call_ashleyt.jcr:description: Good call, Ashley. Thanks for the reminder.
civd-good_call_ashleyt.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
